pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical and Viz Tools for Vector-Borne Diseases in Colombia // Provides statistical and visualization tools for the analysis of demographic indicators, and spatio-temporal behavior and characterization of outbreaks of vector-borne diseases (VBDs) in Colombia. It implements travel times estimated in Bravo-Vega C., Santos-Vega M., Cordovez J.M. (2022), and the endemic channel method (Bortman, M. (1999) https://iris.paho.org/handle/10665.2/8562).
